name: Dev-C++ Project File
summary: Learn about .DEV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Parallels Desktop for Mac with Windows installed

content: Since Dev-C++ is free and distributed under the GNU General Public License, it is popular for educational purposes and small development projects. Programmers, students, and hobbyists who write software in C or C++ are the primary users of the software.

The DEV file type organizes all resources related to a project in one place. The file does not contain the actual source code but instead links to the code files stored elsewhere on the computer. It may also store configuration details such as compiler parameters, debugging preferences, and project-specific notes.

description: A DEV file is a project file created by Bloodshed Software Dev-C++, an open-source integrated development environment (IDE) used for C and C++ programming. It contains information about a programming project, including references to source code files, compiler settings, and build options. DEV files allow developers to save and reopen their projects in Dev-C++ without manually reconfiguring settings each time.

instructions: You can open DEV files with Bloodshed Software Dev-C++ in Windows. When you open a DEV file with the program, the IDE loads these settings and associated code files for editing and compiling.
